phrases: Once upon a time, a witch's curse put a princess into an eternal sleep,
and one young man appeared, intending to awake her.
Awaken the princess from her sleep?
What a cruel thing to do.
Is the princess not wishing for the kiss of awakening,
but rather to continue to sleep forever?
What do I think of you, Fakir?
And when I think of Tutu...
but I do not know what those feelings are.
Tell me, Fakir, do not I need to know what they are?
Do not think about such absurd things!
Listen, you are just a useless good-for...
Oh, I just could not sleep somehow.
I guess for Rue-chan, he will smile like that.
There is no way that he does not need a heart!
I will get your heart back.
Is he trying to trick Mytho into doing whatever he says?
Or is he after something else?
It is no use no matter what you are plotting.
Princess Tutu will get all of Mytho's heart...
Maybe she mistook the time and left early again.
Says it is the Eleki Troupe.
We are a touring ballet troupe called the Eleki Troupe.
Starting the day after tomorrow, we will perform Sleeping Beauty at this theater.
Ladies and gentlemen, please come to see us!
I look forward to seeing you there!
Hey, did you see that flier?
They are called the Eleki Troupe!
They are performing at the theater in town!
I want to go see them!
And so, today, we have received special permission for both the boys and girls to observe the Eleki Troupe's rehearsal.
I hope you take this chance to get a taste of foreign ballet and use that towards your own growth as a dancer a little...
Do you not think so, Ahiru-san?!
I do not think so, either!
Yes, you are exactly right, Cat-sensei.
I do not think so at all!
What is it that you do not think so about?
Um, well, so, about wanting to marry you...
Mytho, you go back to the dormitory.
He might not be able to recover.
Does it bother you that the Mytho-sama is not here?
You are bothered by what Fakir-sama does, too?!
You said you were not interested in Fakir-sama, remember?!
She is at that age when you fall in love!
You are all lovey for Mytho-sama, right?!
You are so cute because you do not know your own place!
Which one do you actually love?!
It is really not anything like that with me.
What an energetic student you are.
I am the leading lady of Eleki Troupe.
It is nice to meet you.
Thank you very much for sharing your precious time with us today,
Let us dispense with the formalities.
I hope you will all make yourselves at home as well.
You got to be held like a princess by such a wonderful person!
Oh, if you wanted to be held, I would have held you!
This is our troupe leader and electrical guy.
The angle is the key in getting him to keep it up.
Was our troupe leader an eel?
Come to think of it, before we got to this town...
But of course that cannot be, right?
Oh, well, it will save us on the power bill.
Say, just watching is boring, is not it?
Let us see someone else dance.
Hey, Paulamoni, this is too sudden...
I shall show you the results of MY lessons!
This is your chance to earn brownie points!
Even if you lose points, you are just back where you were!
I cannot, I cannot, I cannot!
Since she is saying she cannot, let us not have her do it!
If you would like, I will perform myself...
Oh, I suppose it was too sudden after all.
We were actually wanting to dance!
We will have a run-through tomorrow, so please come watch!
I am always nervous when I get up on stage,
but I have never felt like this.
I fell in love with that Princess Aurora I saw when I was a child.
She seemed to still be dreaming even when awakened.
I wanted to become like that someday.
So, I danced the part of Princess Aurora all this time, but...
I would begun to be aware that it was no use, no matter how I polished my technique.
It is because I was not born with the same talent.
My dream, never to come true...
No matter how depressed I was, I never felt like this before.
What is the matter with me?
Help me out with making dinner for everyone.
If we do not feed our troupe leader soon, we will have a power outage.
You want to postpone opening day?
You have got something on your mind, do not you?
Thank you for worrying about me.
But I could not trouble everyone else.
Do not worry, I can do it.
Would anyone like some beautiful gems?
I did not know you sold gems, Edel-san.
And Fakir said that he does not need a heart.
There is no way that is true, right?
You know, Mytho does not even know what it feels like to be in love.
You think so, do not you?
So, no matter what Fakir does to get in my way, I am definitely going to get all of his heart back.
Rue-chan can make Mytho happy, but for a bird like me, that is all I can do for him.
The name of this gem is dream.
Between a person who continues to dream and a person who is awoken from a dream, who is happier?
Anyway, what is this gem called?
At any rate, my wish is to get Mytho to smile again.
I am going to work harder and get back all the shards of Mytho's heart for him!
Yes, I will do my best!
Go on the ballet field trip tomorrow.
Do not listen to what Rue tells you.
Hurry up and go to sleep.
The girl you called on today...
I wanted to see her dance too.
She had this glow about her, kind of a mysterious charm that she just had innately.
I am sure she is pursuing a wonderful dream.
And she is probably also in love.
You certainly can tell a lot.
Yeah, because she is the same as you when you were younger.
You will always wake from a dream.
No, it is something you MUST wake from.
You cannot play the role of Aurora the way you are now.
Yeah, because the Aurora you aspire to be
is the kind of girl who continues to dream
even when she is woken from her dream, right?
But you are afraid to even dream.
That is because I cannot become that Aurora.
Sure, there are some dreams that will not come true,
but there is no rule that says you can only have one dream.
is to enthrall people all over the world with your dancing.
And to do that, I have even thought of the perfect program for you.
To try jumping on the bandwagon of my dream?
I had no idea you were thinking about things like that.
I am a long way from waking from my dream or my love, you know.
I will dance my final turn as Aurora in this town!
There is no need for worry.
No matter how the witch may curse me, I will surely never prick my finger on a spindle.
For though I may dream and dance, I will never lay a hand on a spinning wheel.
Was that because he was dancing with me?
All right, everyone, let us take a break!
How may I be of service?
I would very much like to speak with you.
You would like to speak with ME?!
However, if you insist, I, too, as a man will...
I was hoping you would allow me to see that girl from yesterday dance.
I just really want to see what it is that I am lacking.
But I am really bad at this.
This is an earnest request from Paulamoni-san.
Do not worry, please dance to your heart's content.
Even if my love were to end because of it, I will never...
It is been a while since Ahiru's been in a pinch!
I have been waiting for this!
Say, Mytho, why do not you partner with her for the pas du deux?
Ooh, our troupe leader's expert opinion gauge is responding.
I will take this chance to make this clear to you.
This girl's dancing is hardly elegant,
but it is overflowing with her own individuality.
I am sorry I asked you to do this when you did not want to.
Uh, no, I am completely fine!
Uh, um, where is the bathroom?!
Go out those doors, turn left, and at the end of the hall...
The shard of the prince's heart is running away.
I wonder what it is so afraid of, Princess Tutu?
Now, let us go back to where you belong.
I do not want to, I am afraid.
No, you have to go back.
So that Mytho can regain his smile.
Come on, give me your hand.
Now, go on back to Mytho.
A piece of his heart's been returned.
I am the only one here!
I am afraid of Princess Tutu.
The feelings of fear and uncertainty.
Yet another shard has been returned.
I wonder what is going to happen after this?
I returned a shard of his heart...
What is going to happen to Mytho?
I just wanted Mytho to smile.
Have I been... doing something terrible... to Mytho?
That is right, this is how the story moves along.
In the direction most undesirable for all concerned.
I have always only had eyes for Mytho.
I am still far from having loved him enough.
I will never appear before you again, so rest easy.
This is the feeling of loneliness and the feeling of sorrow.
I see, so... you have finally appeared.
I will not give you anything.
I will not allow you to do anything.
All you children who love stories, come gather around.
The voice calling, come now, wake up
The brilliant light and the dew on trees are born
By the secret water's edge that no one knows of
Dance the pas de deux of life
It is a gentle, yet fierce current
How far does the labyrinth stretch?
I loved like I was dreaming
I thought how wonderful it was to be alive
I want to be there for you
Passing by even the wind and the rain clouds
